caseTitle: Pakistan Bar Council through its Chairman v. Federal Government through Establishment Division and others
tagline: The Legal Education Rules of 2015 have an overriding effect and lay down, inter alia, the eligibility criteria for admission to the LL.B. programme, duration of the programme, inspection of law faculties and departments of law colleges for establishing or renewing their qualifying status as affiliates of recognized degree awarding university. Law degree awarding institutions must comply with the guidelines and rules framed by the Bar Councils from time to time.
